attributes.action: stop making  a mockery of the e-petition service and the democratic process generally, and give a specific response to the petition put to him that abiding by a religious faith does not constitute descrimination!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is in response to the "Adoption-choice epetition response" which can be found here! http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11466.asp

We, the undersigned, demand the Prime Minister state plainly whether he thinks that following a personal religious belief is a discriminatory practise.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
